plugins.name: Name Shame
plugins.description:
Name Shame is a lovingly vibe-coded plugin born from one designer‚Äôs deep-seated frustration with default layer names like ‚ÄúRectangle 123‚Äù and ‚ÄúGroup 87.‚Äù Instead of silently suffering, I decided to roast my own poor file hygiene‚Äîand now yours too.


This plugin scans your Figma file for default-named layers, serves up a spicy roast for each offender, and lets you rename them with beautifully ridiculous alternatives like ‚Äúsuch_lazy‚Äù or ‚Äúidentity_crisis.‚Äù Use it for laughs, use it for cleanup, use it because your future self deserves better.


File hygiene matters. Might as well make it fun. üéâ

accepted.name: Aaron May
accepted.description:
Professional & Punchy
Creative Director with a love for design systems, clear UI, and a well-organized layer panel.

plugins.tagline: Scans bland layer names, dishes witty roasts and renames them with delightful absurdity

133359.name: Name Shame
133359.description:

plugins.name: BrowserLens
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you import color styles from the BrowserLens web extension. Insert colors as layers in your design and add palettes to your local styles.


Learn more about BrowserLens: https://browserlens.com/

Documentation: https://docs.browserlens.com/


How to Use

  1. Open any webpage with the BrowserLens extension.
  2. Click export > Figma (BrowserLens Plugin).
  3. Download the style file for Figma.
  4. Run this plugin and upload the style file.
  5. Choose whether to add colors as local styles.
  6. Click 'Import Styles'.


About BrowserLens


BrowserLens is a web extension designed to extract styling and seo information from any webpage without the need for developer tools. It provides a simple UI for extracting and copying webpage information from the current tab.


Extension Features

  1. ‚å®Ô∏è View fonts used on a webpage and the associated CSS values.
  2. üñåÔ∏è Extract colors from a webpage and click to copy color value.
  3. üåÖ Extract gradients from a webpage and click to copy CSS value.
  4. üé® Export color palettes to Figma.
  5. üåê Preview SEO data including page meta, OpenGraph tags and Twitter Card data.
  6. ‚úÖ Check SEO meta for best practices including title and description length.
  7. üñºÔ∏è List all images present on a page and click to download, including background images.
  8. üåÉ Dark mode support.

accepted.name: BrowserLens
accepted.description:
Extract colors, fonts, media and seo meta from any site without using developer tools. 

Available for Chrome, Firefox and Edge

plugins.tagline: Import styles from the BrowserLens web extension

plugins.name: SnapCap
plugins.description:
Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your FigJam board or Figma Design file in a single click, making it easier than ever to document user experiences as you browse the web.


Please note that to use SnapCap, you will also need to install the companion Chrome extension at snapcap.app/extension


How to Use SnapCap

Installation

  1. Install the Figma plugin
  2. Install the Chrome browser extension, and pin it


Session Setup

  1. Open the FigJam board or Figma Design file where you wish to send screenshots
  2. Launch the Figma plugin and click "Start new session"
  3. Copy the generated session code
  4. Click on the SnapCap browser extension and enter the copied session code


Taking Screenshots

Once your session has connected, click on the SnapCap browser extension anytime you want to take a screenshot and send it to your Figma file. A check mark will be shown on the extension icon to indicate that the screenshot was captured successfully, and it will show up moments later in the Figma file where the FigCap plugin is running.


Ending Session

When you are done taking screenshots, click the End button. If the SnapCap browser extension does not automatically disconnect, you can right click on the extension icon and select "End session"


Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/
plugins.tagline: Capture screenshots from any webpage and instantly send them to your Figma files

Demo video and more at www.snapcap.app/

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: FigJam Sticky Color Picker
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for setting the color of Sticky:

  1. Directly set the fill color of the Sticky.
  2. It is also able to set the color of the text within the Sticky.
  3. You can set the color for a single Sticky node, or for multiple selected Sticky nodes. Even more, you can directly select an area, and the plugin will automatically identify the Sticky nodes within the selected area and change their colors as well as the colors of the text.
plugins.tagline: Custom the color of sticky and sticky text

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

plugins.name: ÂõæË°®Â∫ì Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

‚Ä¢Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

‚Ä¢Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

‚Ä¢Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

‚Ä¢Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed‚Äîstyles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

‚Ä¢Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

‚Ä¢If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

‚Ä¢Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.

‚Ä¢Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

plugins.name: ProtoFlow ‚Äì Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
üí° Cos'√® ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow √® un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non √® accessibile


üöÄ Come funziona


Seleziona uno o pi√π frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca ‚ÄúScarica prototipo‚Äù.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all‚Äôutilizzo


üß† Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un‚Äôintera schermata pu√≤ essere interattiva.


üì¶ Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all‚Äôuso, anche per utenti non tecnici


‚ö†Ô∏è Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, n√© i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


üìò Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell‚Äôarchivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


üîê Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


üë®‚Äçüíª Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: Figma to Amplitude Taxonomy Exporter
plugins.description:
If your team hands off the tracking plan along with the design in figma and then manually creates the tracking plan inside amplitude again, use this plugin to export the tracking plan inside figma and import it to amplitude.


Just write your event and event properties in the syntax shown in the instructions, select all events you want to export, run the plugin and get the csv.
plugins.tagline: Send tracking plan from Figma to Amplitude in two clicks

plugins.name: Design to System
plugins.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system ‚Äî effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. üîç Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. üìå Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. üéØ Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements ‚Äî ensuring consistency and systemization.
plugins.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system ‚Äì automatically.

136167.name: Design to System
136167.description:
Design to System is a Figma plugin that helps you convert your existing designs into a structured design system ‚Äî effortlessly.

With just a few clicks, you can extract styles from your design, register them as local styles, and reapply them consistently across your file.


Key Features

  1. üîç Analyze Selection : Extracts all design style properties (colors, text styles, shadows) from the selected layers. Color values are automatically categorized into background, text, and stroke styles for easier organization.
  2. üìå Register Styles : Registers the extracted styles into your Figma local styles panel. This enables consistent reuse and supports design system creation.
  3. üéØ Apply Styles : Applies the registered local styles back to the selected design elements ‚Äî ensuring consistency and systemization.
136167.tagline: Turn your designs into a reusable system ‚Äì automatically.

plugins.name: Awesome Bulk Metadata Importer
plugins.description:
Have you ever tried to add extra documentation to your Figma components, looking or better parity with your code or docs site? With this plugin, you can better utilize the Assets menu by searching components or icons by description or keywords.


This plugin checks a JSON file, and updates the alt text/description, synonym keywords, and link for all components and variants. Run this 1x for your entire library and stop wasting time manually updating metadata!


Sample CSV and JSON template
plugins.tagline: Bulk update your component descriptions, keywords, and docs link

plugins.name: Button State Builder
plugins.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button.‚Ä®Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like ‚Äî then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states.‚Ä®We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.
plugins.tagline: Build perfect button states, effortlessly

135693.name: Button State Builder
135693.description:
Button State Builder helps you create all interactive states (hover, pressed, disabled, & focused) from a single base button.‚Ä®Style your base button (colors, fonts, icons) however you like ‚Äî then run the plugin to automatically generate polished, accessible states.


To properly run the plugin, the button layout must include a state layer that accepts interactive color states.‚Ä®We recommend starting from a base button provided in the playground file.

plugins.name: SAR - Search and Replace
plugins.description:
**SAR (Search and Replace)** is a simple and efficient Figma plugin that helps you rename layers in bulk.


Select any frame or run across the entire page to:

- üîç Search for any text in layer names

- ‚úèÔ∏è Replace it with new content

- üß† Choose case-sensitive or global replacement


Perfect for cleaning up messy file structures, renaming layers by version or type, and maintaining naming consistency across your design system.


No more manual renaming. Just SAR it. üöÄ
plugins.tagline: Quickly search and replace text in layer names ‚Äì all at once.

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ‚ú∑

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

135549.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
135549.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.
135549.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

plugins.name: Quick QR
plugins.description:
Quick QR: Generate dynamic QR codes instantly, right within your Figma designs. This simple plugin lets you quickly create and embed QR codes without ever leaving Figma.


Perfect for adding QR codes to your designs, linking prototypes, sharing resources, or anything else you need a scannable link for. No fuss, just easy QRs.


You can find the code repo at: https://github.com/birazzzz/easyqr
plugins.tagline: Effortless QR codes, right in your Figma workflow.

135338.name: Quick QR
135338.description:
Quick QR: Generate dynamic QR codes instantly, right within your Figma designs. This simple plugin lets you quickly create and embed QR codes without ever leaving Figma.


Perfect for adding QR codes to your designs, linking prototypes, sharing resources, or anything else you need a scannable link for. No fuss, just easy QRs.


You can find the code repo at: https://github.com/birazzzz/easyqr

plugins.name: TrackSpawn
plugins.description:
Quickly generate clean, numbered frames in Figma.

Perfect for building layouts with repeatable structure. Content blocks, mockups, dashboards, and more.

Set the count. Spawn the stack. Done.


Built for flow.

plugins.name: Kobalt Copilot
plugins.description: Analyze your marketing designs for compliance risks without leaving Figma. Simply select a frame, hit analyze, and instantly receive risk assessments from Kobalt's marketing compliance tool. Identify potential regulatory issues early in your design process and create compliant marketing materials with confidence. Note: You need a subscription to Kobalt Copilot (www.kobaltlabs.com) to run analyses.
plugins.tagline: Marketing compliance risk review

plugins.name: Content Generator
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you replace selected text layers with smart, AI-generated content based on your own descriptions. No more lorem ipsum‚Äîjust real, context-aware mock text that fits your design.


How to use

Select one or more text layers, then enter the kind of content you'd like to generate‚Äîlike ‚Äúnames,‚Äù ‚Äújob titles,‚Äù or ‚Äúshort bios‚Äù‚Äîand the plugin will fill them in instantly.
plugins.tagline: Generate realistic text content in Figma instantly‚Äîbased on your own prompts.
